title: Itineraries
description: Currently in development, this project aims to simplify trip planning. Users can create and share itineraries seamlessly. The website, built with TypeScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Firebase, promises a user-friendly experience.

title: Plate Initiative
description: Successfully completed, Plate Initiative is a static website for a non-profit organization focused on educating youths about culinary arts. Built with TypeScript, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, it offers multiple pages, forms, and full mobile responsiveness. Hosted on Vercel.

title: mirrorednova.github.io
description: My personal website, a static showcase of my skills, experience, and projects. Developed with TypeScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and NextUI, it serves as a comprehensive portfolio for anyone interested.

title: Monkey Management
description: A data-driven website for social media management, Monkey Management allows admins to create, edit, and delete blog and project posts. Built with TypeScript, Next.js, SCSS, Cloudinary, and Firebase, it features a custom CMS supporting styling and media uploads.
